longdescription: In this activity, you will create a web-form that calculates your age in days, hours, nanoseconds, any unit of time that you specify!

name: Random Melodies
shortdescription: Create music through code! Can you play your favorite melody using Wolfram Language?
longdescription: In this activity, students create random melodies using various musical scales and instruments. Create music through code!

name: Sound of PI
shortdescription: Have you ever wondered what the famous number PI would sound like on a musical instrument?
longdescription: In this activity, there are a series of steps with code ready to run. Students start with a piece of code that works, and then modify it to do different things. Students can play melodies based on the digits of PI and explore what PI sounds like using many musical instruments.

name: Draw a Sphere
shortdescription: How many 3D shapes can you create?
longdescription: Explore 3D graphics in this activity and create your own shapes.

name: Draw a Polygon
shortdescription: Explore creating amazing polygon shapes!
longdescription: Explore creating different polygon shapes in this activity.

name: Ninja Name Generator
shortdescription: What is your ninja name?
longdescription: In this activity, students develop a name generator that transforms their name into ninja names.

name: Your First Webpage in an Hour!
shortdescription: Create and share a Webpage with your favorite joke!
longdescription:
Go to www.sololearn.com and install HTML and CSS apps or open the relevant lessons on the web (Android users can install the unified SoloLearn app).  Complete 2 modules (Overview and HTML Basics) in HTML and 2 modules (The Basics and Working w/Text) and first 5 lessons of the 3rd module (Properties) in CSS. 
Get the template at https://code.sololearn.com/WKeg2CtzpRts/ and follow the instructions.

name: Build YOUR mobile APP
shortdescription: Learn design & systems thinking to create mobile apps for you & your friends.
longdescription: Create your own mobile app.  Learn the sequencing and systems thinking to create apps you and your friends can use.  Design using chat Blox, quizzes, flashcards, calendars, maps, pictures and more into stories or interactive apps that work on any iOS or Android phone.  Anyone and everyone can create a mobile app.  Your content, Your customization, Your APP on Your Phone.
